dmca.title: Alleging a Spectrum of Infringement
dmca.body:
1). Indentification of Product being Infringed
The product being infringed is the Multi-DNC software program. We crated & resell the product. ATS Spartec & Memex are still illegally reselling stolen copies of our software. This was already established in our previous DMCA complaint #12821908 which was upheld.

2). Google Search query 
Search Query:    Multi-DNC 
MuItiDNC

Infringing Links

Memex Electronics: CNC Memory, Multi-DNC Software, CNC
